Package boundary

Class DoctorBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.Boundary
boundary.DoctorBoundary
public class DoctorBoundary extends Boundary
DoctorBoundary class represents the user interface for a doctor in the HMS system This class handles doctor-specific interactions

    • generateAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public String generateAppointmentOutcomeRecord(MedicalRecord medicalRecord, String diagnosisID, String typeOfService, String consultationNotes, LocalDateTime appointmentTime)
      Generates an appointment outcome record for a specific medical record and diagnosis. Populates the outcome record with details such as patient ID, doctor ID, type of service, and consultation notes, and marks the outcome status as incomplete.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord - the medical record associated with the appointment
      diagnosisID - the ID of the diagnosis for the appointment outcome
      typeOfService - the type of service provided during the appointment
      consultationNotes - notes taken by the doctor during the consultation
      Returns:
      the created AppointmentOutcomeRecord object

    • retrieveMedicalRecordID

      public String retrieveMedicalRecordID(String patientID)
      Retrieves a medical record ID for the specified doctor and patient. Searches through records in the repository to find the one that matches the doctor and patient IDs.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      the ID of the medical record matching the doctor and patient, or null if none found
